tool.name: Soprano NMR
tool.description: Extract and analyse NMR data from a .magres file.
tool.command: #if $merge.merge: #for i, file in enumerate($merge.input): ln -s '$file' '$i'.magres && #end for #else: ln -s '$merge.input' input.magres && #end if soprano nmr $merge.merge #for property in $properties: --properties $property #end for --symprec '$symprec' --precision '$precision' #if $isotopes: --isotopes '$isotopes' #end if #if $average_group: --average-group '$average_group' #end if --euler '$euler' #if $references: --references '$references' #end if #if $gradients: --gradients '$gradients' #end if #if $subset: --subset '$subset' #end if $reduce --query '$query' #if $sortby: --sortby '$sortby' #end if --sort-order '$sort_order' #if $include: --include '$include' #end if #if $exclude: --exclude '$exclude' #end if --output-format '$output_format' --output $output *.magres

param.label: Properties
param.help: Properties for which to extract and summarise.

param.label: Reference shielding
param.help: Reference shielding for each element (in ppm). Format is comma separated list of entries, with the element and ppm separated by a colon. E.G. `C:170,H:123`.

param.label: Reference shielding gradients
param.help: Reference shielding gradients for each element. If unset, will default to -1 for all elements. Format is comma separated list of entries, with the element and gradient separated by a colon. E.G. `H:-1,C:-0.97`.

tool.help:
Usage: soprano nmr seedname.magres
Processes .magres file(s) containing NMR-related properties and prints a summary. It defaults to printing all NMR properties present in the file for all the atoms.
This work was facilitated by software tools (specifically Soprano) developed by the Collaborative Computing Project for NMR Crystallography, funded by EPSRC grant EP/T026642/1.
